processTimeline.title: 1. Understand
processTimeline.description: The process starts by ensuring that all of your strategic goals will be met discussing all details about the needed solution in an in-house or remote Lean Inception workshop.

processTimeline.title: 2. Design
processTimeline.description: After gathering all required information, we start to design the solution using a prototyping tool (like Figma) to validate our partner’s ideas and goals, furthermore, all design created in this step is useful for the squad in the next steps.

processTimeline.title: 3. Develop
processTimeline.description: When any design fragment of the solution is validated by the partner, we start to code it keeping in mind that our goal is to delivery true value with excellence. To achieve this, we follow our coding standards that ensure the solution is growing up healthy.

processTimeline.title: 4. Improve
processTimeline.description: The “design → develop” steps are being repeated while the application is growing up until it is done.
